name: Project Wiz (Alpha Demo)
description:
Imagine if you and your best friends gained superpowers...

Wiz is a sidescroller with RPG and Social elements inspired by many different media. (Cave Story, Scott Pilgrim, Persona, Power Rangers, etc.)

The story of normal teenagers living a normal life on a normal island and suddenly obtaining magical powers.

  • Alternate between your friends to fight with different powers.
  • Jump, Shoot, Punch, Throw, and more,
  • Go to school by day, protect the island by night.
  • Hang out with your best friends on the weekend.
  • Play games, make music, eat diner, and more activities!

DOWNLOAD THE DEMO BELOW!

*This is a work in progress, many assets are not final and will be replaced and bugs will be fixed- If you encounter any bugs please let me know*
